scripts.serve: npm run env && npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions,database,firestore --import=./dev-data
scripts.shell: npm run env && npm run build && firebase functions:shell
scripts.env: npm run setup && firebase functions:config:get > .runtimeconfig.json || firebase functions:config:get | ac .runtimeconfig.json
scripts.setup: test -f env.json && firebase functions:config:unset env && firebase functions:config:set env="$(cat env.json)" || echo "Please add the file env.json before deploy."
scripts.env:prod: npm run setup:prod && firebase functions:config:get > .runtimeconfig.json || firebase functions:config:get | ac .runtimeconfig.json
scripts.setup:prod: test -f env-prod.json && firebase functions:config:unset env && firebase functions:config:set env="$(cat env-prod.json)" || echo "Please add the file env-prod.json before deploy."
scripts.deploy: npm run env:prod && npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions
